buffs.description: When included in a team, medal buff increases by 70% (from 30% to 100%).
buffs.name: Revival Team for Spirit Rest Runs

hidden_abilites: Increases basic speed of the game by 7%.
Increases self movement speed by 10% and attack distance by 9%.
Increases movement speed by 7% and critical damage by 9% for all units.
Attack power and critical damage probability increases greatly against enemy crystal.
When put in revival team, medal buff increases by 70%. (Increases bonus medals gained from revival from 30% to 100%)
[Mark of Death] Skill Enhancement: Enemy with mark of death applied receives 30% additional damage. (For raid boss, there is a 30% chance of recieving 7% additional damage.)
description.skill2: Reach limit break of Maximum Medal Buff from transcended Unit in Time Shop (0%, 0%, 300%, 400%, 500%)
description.skill3: Awakens the hidden special ability of [ Senior Shadow Knight ]
